Reference

Iterators

oomdata_tbl() oomdata_dbi() oomdata_con()

Iterate over tibble, DBIResult or connection in chunks.

Models

oomlm()

Out of memory Linear model

oomlm_robust()

Out of memory Linear model with robust standard errors

oomglm()

Out of memory Generalized Linear model

Fit

fit(<oomlm>)

Fit oomlm model to additional observations

fit(<oomglm>)

Fit oomglm model via Iteratively Reweighted Least Squares (IRLS).

init_weight() weight() end_weight()

Reweighting functions that comprise an IRLS iteration

Predict

predict(<oomlm>) predict(<oomglm>)

Predict values using oomlm and oomglm models

residuals(<oomlm>) residuals(<oomglm>)

Calculate residuals for oomlm and oomglm models
